articles.title: India Cements reports Q3 PAT of Rs 62 crore against Rs 5.4 crore loss YoY; stock still trades flat - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The cement maker reported standalone net profit at Rs 62 crore against Rs 5.4 crore loss (YoY). The company's standalone revenue went down 2.6 percent at Rs 1,160 crore against Rs 1,191.1 crore (YoY).
articles.content:
India Cements share price was trading in the red on January 27 after the company declared its Q3 results.
